Package org.soulwing.prospecto.api.json

Class JsonSpliceHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.soulwing.prospecto.api.json.JsonSpliceHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SpliceHandler
    public class JsonSpliceHandler
extends Object
implements SpliceHandler
    A SpliceHandler that can be used to embed a JsonStructure into a view.
    Author:
    Carl Harris
